casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Istok.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Istok (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 32.]

(No. 93-2540 Submitted January 26, 1994 Decided April 20, 1994.) *33Geoffrey Stem, Disciplinary Counsel, and Alvin E. Mathews, Assistant Disciplinary Counsel, for relator. Per Curiam.

We concur in the findings and recommendation of the board. Respondent, James M. Istok, is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
